CreateCluster.title: 创建集群

DescribeClusterActivities.document: 根据集群ID查询集群活动历史记录。
DescribeClusterActivities.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: thpc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeClusterActivities
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ClusterId": "hpc-0yd8fqsc",
    "Limit": "1",
    "Offset": "0"
}
DescribeClusterActivities.title: 查询集群活动历史记录

SetAutoScalingConfiguration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: thpc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SetAutoScalingConfiguration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DryRun": "false",
    "ShrinkIdleTime": "300",
    "ExpansionBusyTime": "120",
    "ClusterId": "hpc-5lyv94lq"
}
SetAutoScalingConfiguration.title: 设置弹性伸缩配置
